To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-09-24 13:41
Subject: Major Incident Notification: Oracle EBS unavailability impacting SO, Finance and Payroll operations
--------------------------------------------------
      

 

Major Incident Notification: Oracle EBS unavailability impacting SO, Finance and Payroll operations

_________________________________________________________________

Date: 24 Sep 2024

Time: 12:55 PM GST


We are experiencing issues with Oracle EBS applications, with issues connecting and accessing the application suite. Ongoing Sales Order, Finance and Payroll operations are impacted.

 Our teams are investigating the issue and working to resolve it as quickly as possible. This may include the need to restart broader Oracle applications across the estate, and users should expect disruption.

Our teams are investigating the issue and working to resolve it as quickly as possible. This may include the need to restart broader Oracle applications across the estate, and users should expect disruption.
